name: Blind Light (MCreeper00 (Adrià Mir Feliu))
description:
Description and lore

Blind Light is a 2D lateral platform game, the objective is to advance to the beat of the music avoiding many lethal obstacles like walls, saws, spikes, or dark zones where sight is lost and you have to follow the beat to survive.

Credits Programming and Design
